entry.string: Autolinks is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: Ootuleenks is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: Automatically links text in articles or other content modules that you have configured.
entry.translation: Ootumeteecelly leenks text in erteecles oor oozeer cuntent mudooles thet yuoo hefe-a cunffeegoored. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Simply set your configuration for the style of links that you want to have, and then start adding autolinks into the system. The module will transform the text from there.
entry.translation: Seemply set yuoor cunffeegooreshun fur zee style-a ooff leenks thet yuoo vunt tu hefe-a, und zeen stert eddeeng ootuleenks intu zee system. Zee mudoole-a veell trunsffurm zee text frum zeere-a.

entry.string: Autolinks provide a transform hook for searching and replacing text as necessary.
entry.translation: Ootuleenks prufeede-a a trunsffurm huuk fur seercheeng und repleceeng text es necessery. Bork bork bork!
